mapper.insert: insert into User (id, phone, social, regTime, statusNo) values (#{userDto.id}, #{userDto.phone}, #{userDto.social}, #{userDto.regTime}, #{userDto.statusNo});
mapper.select: select userNo from User where id=#{id};
mapper.update: update User set statusNo = ${statusNo} where userNo = ${userNo};
